academy: a graduate of the <1>Fullstack Developer</1> program at <3>Coding Academy</3>, and also hold a Bachelor’s degree in <5>Economics and Information Systems</5> from <7>Tel-Hai College</7>.
why web: I was first exposed to the field of <1>web development</1> toward the end of my undergraduate studies. The feeling that a single line of code could display something tangible on the screen made me connect deeply to <1>web development</1>, the field I chose to specialize in.
professional knowledge: With my professional knowledge, I want to build websites with a solid foundation and proper architecture, designed to reflect each person’s unique taste.
difference: The key difference between a website I develop from scratch with <1>clean code</1> and the <3>Off the Shelf</3> website builders is that code-based websites provide <5>faster browsing performance</5>, optimized site structure for <7>search engine ranking</7>, and complete <9>design freedom</9> without being limited by templates.
every business needs: In today’s world, every business needs an <1>online presence</1>, not only on social media. I’m here to walk with you step by step, with professionalism and a smile!
